colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES BLA MA'I 'DAS MCHOD BYA TSUL 'KHYER BDE LEGS TSOGS RAB 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO AER TE NI MER GEN PAndI TA SPRUL SKU TSE DBANG RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO'I DGONGS RDZOGS KYI RNAM DKAR LA DMIGS NAS, ,RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS ^DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS RANG GIS NYAMS SU BLANG BA'I RIM PA LTAR GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA'I SEMS KYIS, ,LCAGS PHAG LO NAG PA ZLA BA'I NYIR GNYIS LA AE WAm DGA' 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,'DIS KYANG CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU ZHI BAR GSHEGS PA'I TSUL BSTAN PA THAMS CAD KYI DGONGS PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
